title: My phone won't recognize the charger.
content:
Often try plugging in the charger that came with my phone and the phone will not recognize it. I have to continue to try to wiggle the plug or position it just right. Many times it will start to charge then stop immediately. 

I tried to call about how to get the problem fixed and was told I can submit a claim but then I have to pay the deductible for a new phone. I don't think I should have to pay for a new phone when this is not because of any damage that was done to the phone. The phone is less than a year old and it is very difficult to get it to recognize a charger (have tried multiple ones).
